title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! Keep your kitchen clean and odor-free with these high-quality trash bags. Designed with convenience and durability in mind, these bags are perfect for any household.

With a generous capacity of 13 gallons, these bags can hold a large amount of waste, making it ideal for busy homes or offices. The tear-resistant white plastic material ensures that the bags won't easily rip or tear, providing you with peace of mind.

Say goodbye to unpleasant smells with the unscented feature of these trash bags. The unscented design keeps your kitchen smelling fresh and clean without any overpowering fragrances.

The red drawstring closure adds an extra layer of convenience. Simply pull the drawstring tight to secure your trash and prevent any leaks or spills. The red color adds a touch of style to your kitchen and makes it easy to identify the bag.

One of the standout features of these trash bags is their Flex-tra strength. The Flex-tra technology provides superior tear resistance, ensuring that the bags can handle even the heaviest loads without breaking or tearing.

For added convenience, these trash bags are compatible with Alexa Voice Shopping. Simply use your voice to order more bags when you're running low, making your life even easier.

Each pack comes with 50 count of trash bags, giving you plenty of supply to last for a long time. Stock up on these Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags today and experience the ultimate in convenience and durability.
